languages.text: "Все тело сслита — это огромная удавка, что сокрушает не только кости, но и самый дух. С каждой секундой давление все растет... и растет... и уже грудь не способна сделать вдох, а сознание начинает биться в предсмертной агонии. Страсть, рожденная удушьем, мало с чем может сравниться в своей силе".

"A Sslyth's entire body is but one giant garrotte that crushes not only bones, but the very spirit. With each passing second, the pressure grows... and grows... and, suddenly, your chest cannot expand enough even to take a breath, and your consciousness begins to struggle in its death throes. Little compares to the passion born of suffocation in terms of sheer power."
languages.original_text: "Все тело сслита — это огромная удавка, что сокрушает не только кости, но и самый дух. С каждой секундой давление все растет... и растет... и уже грудь не способна сделать вдох, а сознание начинает биться в предсмертной агонии. Страсть, рожденная удушьем, мало с чем может сравниться в своей силе".

Little compares to the passion born of suffocation in terms of sheer power."

languages.text: “蛇人的身体本身就是个巨大的绞盘，不仅可以绞碎骨头，还能绞碎精神。随着时间一分一秒地流逝，压力会越来越大……越来越大……突然之间，你感觉胸腔甚至无法呼吸，意识也开始在死亡的阵痛中不断挣扎。若是仅仅从快感的强烈程度而言，几乎没有哪种快感，可以与窒息产生的激情相提并论。”
languages.original_text: "A Sslyth's entire body is but one giant garrotte that crushes not only bones, but the very spirit. With each passing second, the pressure grows... and grows... and, suddenly, your chest cannot expand enough even to take a breath, and your consciousness begins to struggle in its death throes. Little compares to the passion born of suffocation in terms of sheer power."

traits.locale_text: “西里斯的身体本身就是个巨大的绞盘，不仅可以绞碎骨头，还能绞碎精神。随着时间一分一秒地流逝，压力会越来越大……越来越大……突然之间，你感觉胸腔甚至无法呼吸，意识也开始在死亡的阵痛中不断挣扎。若是仅仅从快感的强烈程度而言，几乎没有哪种快感，可以与窒息产生的激情相提并论。”

languages.text: 「ススリス自体が巨大が絞首刑台のようなもので、骨だけでなく精神そのものも砕いてしまう。1秒ごとにどんどん…どんどん圧力が大きくなる…そして突然、胸がうまく膨らまなくなって、呼吸さえままならなくなり、死の苦しみの中で意識がグチャグチャになる。力そのものという点では、窒息から生まれる情熱に匹敵するものはほぼないぜ」
languages.original_text: "A Sslyth's entire body is but one giant garrotte that crushes not only bones, but the very spirit. With each passing second, the pressure grows... and grows... and, suddenly, your chest cannot expand enough even to take a breath, and your consciousness begins to struggle in its death throes. Little compares to the passion born of suffocation in terms of sheer power."

traits.locale_text: 「ススリス自体が巨大が絞首刑台のようなもので、骨だけでなく精神そのものも砕いてしまう。1秒ごとにどんどん…どんどん圧力が大きくなる…そして突然、胸がうまく膨らまなくなって、呼吸さえままならなくなり、死の苦しみの中で意識がグチャグチャになる。力そのものという点では、窒息から生まれる情熱に匹敵するものはほぼないぜ」

languages.text: «Todo el cuerpo de un sslyth es un gigantesco tentáculo constrictor que no solo tritura huesos, sino el propio espíritu. Con cada segundo que pasa, la presión aumenta cada vez más... y más... hasta que de repente tu pecho ya no puede expandirse lo suficiente para respirar y tu consciencia empieza a debatirse con los estertores de la muerte. En términos de poder bruto, muy pocas cosas pueden compararse con la pasión que nace de la asfixia».
languages.original_text: "A Sslyth's entire body is but one giant garrotte that crushes not only bones, but the very spirit. With each passing second, the pressure grows... and grows... and, suddenly, your chest cannot expand enough even to take a breath, and your consciousness begins to struggle in its death throes. Little compares to the passion born of suffocation in terms of sheer power."

traits.locale_text: «Todo el cuerpo de un sslyth es un gigantesco tentáculo constrictor que no solo tritura huesos, sino el propio espíritu. Con cada segundo que pasa, la presión aumenta cada vez más... y más... hasta que de repente tu pecho ya no puede expandirse lo suficiente para respirar y tu consciencia empieza a debatirse con los estertores de la muerte. En términos de poder bruto, muy pocas cosas pueden compararse con la pasión que nace de la asfixia».

languages.text: « Le corps tout entier d'un Sslyth est une sorte d'immense garrot qui broie non seulement les os, mais aussi l'âme même de sa victime. À chaque seconde qui passe, la pression monte... monte... jusqu'à ce que vous soyez incapable de gonfler votre poitrine pour respirer et que votre conscience commence à se débattre dans les affres de la mort. En termes de puissance brute, peu de choses sont comparables à la poussée d'adrénaline induite par l'asphyxie. »
languages.original_text: "A Sslyth's entire body is but one giant garrotte that crushes not only bones, but the very spirit. With each passing second, the pressure grows... and grows... and, suddenly, your chest cannot expand enough even to take a breath, and your consciousness begins to struggle in its death throes. Little compares to the passion born of suffocation in terms of sheer power."

traits.locale_text: « Le corps tout entier d'un sslyth est une sorte d'immense garrot qui broie non seulement les os, mais aussi l'âme même de sa victime. À chaque seconde qui passe, la pression monte... monte... jusqu'à ce que vous soyez incapable de gonfler votre poitrine pour respirer et que votre conscience commence à se débattre dans les affres de la mort. En termes de puissance brute, peu de choses sont comparables à la poussée d'adrénaline induite par l'asphyxie. »

languages.text: "Der gesamte Körper eines Sslyths bildet eine riesige Garrotte, darauf ausgelegt, nicht nur Knochen zu brechen, sondern vor allem den Geist. Mit jeder Sekunde wächst der Druck ... immer weiter ... und plötzlich dehnt sich der Brustkorb nicht mehr weit genug und man kann nicht mehr einatmen, was das Bewusstsein in seinem Todeskampf fast zur Aufgabe zwingt. Es gibt eigentlich nichts Mächtigeres, was mit der Leidenschaft einhergeht, die man beim Ersticken erlebt."
languages.original_text: "A Sslyth's entire body is but one giant garrotte that crushes not only bones, but the very spirit. With each passing second, the pressure grows... and grows... and, suddenly, your chest cannot expand enough even to take a breath, and your consciousness begins to struggle in its death throes. Little compares to the passion born of suffocation in terms of sheer power."

Mit jeder Sekunde wächst der Druck ... immer weiter ... und plötzlich dehnt sich der Brustkorb nicht mehr weit genug und man kann nicht mehr einatmen, was das Bewusstsein in seinem Todeskampf fast zur Aufgabe zwingt. languages.text: "Bir Sslyth'in tüm bedeni yalnızca kemikleri değil, aynı zamanda ruhu da ezip geçen devasa bir boğma işkencesinden ibarettir. Geçen her saniyeyle birlikte baskı daha da... Daha da artar ve... Aniden göğsün, nefes alacak kadar bile genişleyemez ve zihnin, ölümün eşiğinde çırpınmaya başlar. Saf güç açısından boğulma hissinden doğan o tutkunun kıyaslanabileceği çok az şey vardır."
languages.original_text: "A Sslyth's entire body is but one giant garrotte that crushes not only bones, but the very spirit. Little compares to the passion born of suffocation in terms of sheer power."
